description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Put your imagination (and your surround sound system!) to the test with these stunning Japanese-themed panoramic soundscapes. Using unique 360 degree photography and dynamic 5.1 ambient effects, they'll transport your mind straight to the land of the rising sun!   (boxart image by albany_tim)
